Author: so_crat_ic
Text: Think about what mental health it takes to get into their condition. My father is anorexic, but he grew up the oldest of 5, with no father, in a time women were not encouraged to work. He has some deep rooted issues, even though, at 60, he looks like damn rockstar physically.  Would you wish his mental condition on you also? Not judging, purely curious?. I know being overweight is painful in its own way, but the reason for some people being anorexic can be some pretty heavy PTSD. Which is nothing to joke around with.
